original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Opammakathāpañha
analyzed: opamma kathā pañha

original: Gadrabhavagga
analyzed: gad ra bha vagga

original: 6. Kummaṅgapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, ‘kummassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena kummassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kummo udakacaro udakeyeva vāsaṁ kappeti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kummaḥ udaka caraḥ udakeya iva vāsam kappeti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbapāṇabhūtapuggalānaṁ hitānukampinā
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sabba pāṇa bhūta puggalānam hita anukampinā

original: mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena sabbāvantaṁ
analyzed: mettā sahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena sabbāvanta

original: lokaṁ pharitvā viharitabbaṁ.
analyzed: lokam pharitvā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kummassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja kummassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, kummo udake uppilavanto sīsaṁ ukkhipitvā yadi koci passati, tattheva nimujjati gāḷhamogāhati ‘mā maṁ te puna passeyyun’ti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja kummaḥ udake uppilavantaḥ sīsam ukkhipitvā yadi koci passati tattha eva nimujjati gāḷham ogāhati mā mamam te puna passeyyunti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesesu opatantesu ārammaṇasare nimujjitabbaṁ gāḷhamogāhitabbaṁ ‘mā maṁ kilesā puna passeyyun’ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena kilesesu opatantesu ārammaṇa sare nimujjitabbam gāḷham ogāhitabbam mā mama kilesā puna passeyyunti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kummassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja kummassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, kummo udakato nikkhamitvā kāyaṁ otāpeti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja kummaḥ udakataḥ nikkhamitvā kāyam otāpeti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nisajjaṭṭhānasayanacaṅkamato mānasaṁ nīharitvā sammappadhāne mānasaṁ otāpetabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena nisajja ṭṭhāna sayana caṅkamataḥ mānasam nīharitvā sammappadhāne mānasam otāpetabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kummassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja kummassa tatiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, kummo pathaviṁ khaṇitvā vivitte vāsaṁ kappeti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja kummaḥ pathavim khaṇitvā vivitte vāsam kappeti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena lābhasakkārasilokaṁ pajahitvā suññaṁ vivittaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena lābha sakkāra silokam pajahitvā suññam

original: kānanaṁ vanapatthaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ appasaddaṁ appanigghosaṁ pavivittamogāhitvā
analyzed: kānanam vana pattham pabbatam kandaram giri guham appasaddam appanigghosam

original: vivitte yeva vāsaṁ upagantabbaṁ.
analyzed: vivitte yā iva vāsam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kummassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja kummassa catuttham aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, therena upasenena vaṅgantaputtena—
analyzed: mahā rāja therena upasenena vaṅganta puttena

original: ‘Vivittaṁ appanigghosaṁ,
analyzed: vivittam appanigghosa

original: vāḷamiganisevitaṁ;
analyzed: vāḷamiganisevita

original: Seve senāsanaṁ bhikkhu,
analyzed: seve senāsanam bhikkhu

original: paṭisallānakāraṇā’ti.
analyzed: paṭisallāna kāraṇā ati

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, kummo cārikaṁ caramāno yadi kañci passati vā, saddaṁ suṇāti
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja kummaḥ cārikam caramānaḥ yadi kañci passati vā saddam suṇāti

original: vā, soṇḍipañcamāni aṅgāni sake kapāle nidahitvā appossukko tuṇhībhūto tiṭṭhati kāyamanurakkhanto;
analyzed: vā soṇḍi pañcamāni aṅgāni sake kapāle nidahitvā appa ussukkaḥ tuṇhībhūto tiṭṭhati kāyam anurakkhanto

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbattha rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammesu
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sabbattha rūpa sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabba dhammesu

original: āpatantesu chasu dvāresu saṁvarakavāṭaṁ anugghāṭetvā mānasaṁ samodahitvā saṁvaraṁ
analyzed: āpatantesu chasu dvāresu sa vara kavāṭam an ugghāṭetvā mānasam samodahitvā

original: katvā satena sampajānena vihātabbaṁ samaṇadhammaṁ anurakkhamānena.
analyzed: katvā satena sampajānena vihātabbam samaṇa dhammam anurakkhamānena

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kummassa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja kummassa pañcamaṃ aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṁyuttanikāyavare kummūpamasuttante—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena sayutta nikāya vare kummūpama suttante

original: ‘Kummova aṅgāni sake kapāle,
analyzed: aṅgāni sake kapāle

original: Samodahaṁ bhikkhu manovitakke;
analyzed: samodaham bhikkhu manaḥ vitakke

original: Anissito aññamaheṭhayāno,
analyzed: a nissitaḥ aññam aheṭhayāno

original: Parinibbuto nūpavadeyya kañcī’”ti.
analyzed: parinibbutaḥ nu upavadeyya kañci iti

original: Kummaṅgapañho chaṭṭho.
analyzed: kummaṅga pañhaḥ chaṭṭho
